reviewText: A captivating historical drama that is excellently done and the English subtitles are done very well.
Perfect, so enjoyable. Hope more of these quality dvd are produced.
I really liked this drama about a historic figure in Korea's history. Good quality and the subtitles are good.

This was the most riveting TV drama series I have ever seen. Each episode pulls you into the lives of the characters so that their pain is your pain. The ways in which power, love of country and affairs of the heart compels some of the most unsettling actions I have ever seen on TV. One finds both hatred and love for many of these people, all at the same time.
TV drama at its best!
